properties.entry: select * from sc_warehouse_inventory where REAL_PRODUCT_ID = '{@#realProductId#}' and LISTING_SKU = '{@#listingSku#}' and ACCOUNT_ID = '{@#accountId#}' and WAREHOUSE_ID = '{@#warehouseId#}' and INVENTORY_TYPE = '{@#inventoryType#}' and INVENTORY_STATUS = '{@#inventoryStatus#}' and INVENTORY_TO = '{@#inventoryTo#}'

INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_inventory ( INVENTORY_ID, REAL_PRODUCT_ID, LISTING_SKU, ACCOUNT_ID, WAREHOUSE_ID, INVENTORY_TYPE, QUANTITY, INVENTORY_STATUS, INVENTORY_TO, CREATED_TIME, CREATOR, LAST_UPDATED_TIME, LAST_UPDATOR ) VALUES ('{@#guid#}', '{@#realProductId#}', '{@#listingSku#}', '{@#accountId#}', '{@#warehouseId#}', '{@#inventoryType#}', '{@#quantity:0#}', '{@#inventoryStatus#}', '{@#inventoryTo#}', NOW() , '{@#loginId#}', NOW() , '{@#loginId#}' )
update sc_warehouse_inventory set quantity= {@#quantity#}, LAST_UPDATED_TIME = NOW(), LAST_UPDATOR = '{@#loginId#}' where inventory_id = '{@#inventoryId#}'

INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_inventory_track (TRACK_ID, REAL_PRODUCT_ID, WAREHOUSE_ID, LISTING_SKU, ACCOUNT_ID, ACTION_TYPE, ACTION, ACTION_ENTITY, INVENTORY_TYPE, QUANTITY, INVENTORY_STATUS, INVENTORY_TO, RESULT, ACTION_TIME, ACTIONOR, INVENTORY_ID ) VALUES ('{@#guid#}', '{@#realProductId#}', '{@#warehouseId#}', '{@#listingSku#}', '{@#accountId#}', '{@#actionType#}', '{@#action#}', '{@#actionEntity#}', '{@#inventoryType#}', '{@#quantity:0#}', '{@#inventoryStatus#}', '{@#inventoryTo#}', '{@#result#}', NOW() , '{@#loginId#}', '{@#inventoryId#}' )
